entry.title: v1.8.0
entry.summary: Changed: Smart summary truncation. When there is no dedicated summary (only Atom feed has it, and many sites don't use it) from the source, we check if the content/description (Both Atom and RSS) field is long enough to be full text. If so, it will be truncated into a "pseudo" summary. If not, we assume the source used the content field as summary, and it will be displayed in full length. Thank you: @LooperXX.

entry.summary: 我们正在做一款笔记软件Logseq，可以关注下： 1. 支持 markdown 2. MAC/Linux/Win 都支持， mobile 会近期支持。 3. 支持 tag 也支持双链，全文检索在持续优化。 4. 因为是本地的，所以算是支持。 5. 社区反馈还比较正向，但是目前还是 Alpha 阶段。 6. 目前开源免费，后续绝大多数功能免费 Josh: 万推，求荐一款笔记软件： 1. 以开源文本存储，完整支持 Markdown 2. 全平台，有良好的全功能网页版 3. 支持tag，优秀的全文索 4. 至少支持一款主流网盘，GDrive /OneDrive… 5. 界面简洁友好 6. 可收费，1-6刀/月左右都ok Notion看了功能太复杂，Inkdrop是个人作品不知道能不能活的长

entry.title: v1.7.2
entry.summary: ⚠ Deprecated: To accommodate the monorepo setup, the node version in all templates/demos/examples has changed from 14 to 16. This is not a breaking change as our compile target is still node 14, and node 16 is backward compatible. We still recommend you start using node-version: "16" in your .github/workflows/update-feed.yaml today to get the performance/security improvements from the newer node. See example Chore: Reorganize to monorepo with npm workspace.

entry.title: v1.6.0
entry.summary: Added: Link from the title of a subscription to its website. Added: Store feedUrl and siteUrl for each source in cache. Added: Semantic element (<time>) for timestamp on the UI. Added: Semantic API for theming the default template. Demo | Source | Docs Changed: Moved feed metadata from article level to feed level in cache. Fixed: Any html-like text was stripped from title. Fixed with encoded text. Removed: href for each source in cache. The value was never used so it's not a breaking change.

entry.summary: 云上贵州突然有了存在价值，美国之外的苹果用户，比如你下个盗版论文，那推荐搞个云上贵州帐号用。除此之外没有其它任何办法能让苹果不把你的数据交给FBI。只有云上贵州依照中国法律交不了。可惜scihub创始人早先不知道这事 🤦‍♂️

entry.summary: 以太坊挖了快三个月了，按照当前价格，差不多毛收入500刀了。一直和挖矿的朋友说挖了eth别卖，在1500刀的时候这么说，现在2700多刀了我还是这么说，一个字就是“屯”。最近eth gas费稍微下降一点，eth价格就暴涨了，后面如果能彻底解决gas费的问题，eth的价格突破1万刀非常简单。（以上不作为投资建议）
